thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: India's Cybertech Systems & Software Dec-Qtr Consol Profit Falls

author: Reuters Editorial
title: India's Cybertech Systems & Software Dec-Qtr Consol Profit Falls

organizations.name: cybertech systems & software dec-qtr consol profit falls

text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Cybertech Systems And Software Ltd :
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL PROFIT 9.9 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT 29.5 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 225 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 210.3 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* SAYS APPROVED FORMATION OF ONE OR MORE UNITS WITH AGGREGATE INVESTMENT UP TO 250 MILLION RUPEES Source text - bit.ly/2CgneJm Further company coverage:
